shall conduct a study to assess options, methods, and strategies for making
			 available voluntary community-based flood insurance policies through the
			 National Flood Insurance Program.

of title 44, Code of

text.#text:
the action
			 involves the replacement of a structure or facility that—

was
			 located in the coastal high hazard area before the incident that caused the
			 structure or facility to be totally destroyed; and

is
			 essential to a community's recovery from a major disaster;

the replacement
			 structure or facility conforms to the most recent Flood Resistant Design and
			 Construction standard issued by the American Society of Civil Engineers, or any
			 more stringent standard approved by the Administrator; and

the eligible
			 entity develops evacuation and emergency response procedures to reduce the risk
			 of loss of human life and operational disruption from a flood.

that is

text.#text:
If

provides better
			 protection against floods; or

promotes the

If a replacement structure or facility is rebuilt at

This
			 section shall apply with respect to any major disaster declared on or after the
			 date of enactment of this Act.
